question: Which among the following is not correct ?
option1: India’s highest airport is Leh Airport in Ladakh
option2: India’s Highest dam in Bhakhra Dam on Sutlej River
option3: Smallest Country in the world is Vatican City (By Area)
option4: Largest Archipelago in the world is Philippines
answer: Largest Archipelago in the world is Philippines
explanation: Largest Archipelago in the world is Indonesia (3000) islands
